18 #ifndef GANDIVA_EXPR_DECOMPOSER_H
19 #define GANDIVA_EXPR_DECOMPOSER_H
20 
21 #include <memory>
22 #include <stack>
23 #include <utility>
24 
25 #include <gtest/gtest_prod.h>
26 #include "gandiva/expression.h"
27 #include "gandiva/node.h"
28 #include "gandiva/node_visitor.h"
29 
30 namespace gandiva {
31 
32 class FunctionRegistry;
33 class Annotator;
34 
37 class ExprDecomposer : public NodeVisitor {
38  public:
39  explicit ExprDecomposer(const FunctionRegistry& registry, Annotator& annotator)
40  : registry_(registry), annotator_(annotator) {}
41 
42  Status Decompose(const Node& root, ValueValidityPairPtr* out) {
43  auto status = root.Accept(*this);
44  if (status.ok()) {
45  *out = std::move(result_);
46  }
47  return status;
48  }
49 
50  private:
51  FRIEND_TEST(TestExprDecomposer, TestStackSimple);
52  FRIEND_TEST(TestExprDecomposer, TestNested);
53  FRIEND_TEST(TestExprDecomposer, TestInternalIf);
54  FRIEND_TEST(TestExprDecomposer, TestParallelIf);
55 
56  Status Visit(const FieldNode& node) override;
57  Status Visit(const FunctionNode& node) override;
58  Status Visit(const IfNode& node) override;
59  Status Visit(const LiteralNode& node) override;
60  Status Visit(const BooleanNode& node) override;
61 
62  // stack of if nodes.
63  class IfStackEntry {
64  public:
65  IfStackEntry(const IfNode& if_node, bool is_then, bool is_terminal_else,
66  int local_bitmap_idx)
67  : if_node_(if_node),
68  is_then_(is_then),
69  is_terminal_else_(is_terminal_else),
70  local_bitmap_idx_(local_bitmap_idx) {}
71 
72  const IfNode& if_node_;
73  bool is_then_;
74  bool is_terminal_else_;
75  int local_bitmap_idx_;
76  };
77 
78  // push 'then entry' to stack. returns either a new local bitmap or the parent's
79  // bitmap (in case of nested if-else).
80  int PushThenEntry(const IfNode& node);
81 
82  // pop 'then entry' from stack.
83  void PopThenEntry(const IfNode& node);
84 
85  // push 'else entry' into stack.
86  void PushElseEntry(const IfNode& node, int local_bitmap_idx);
87 
88  // pop 'else entry' from stack. returns 'true' if this is a terminal else condition
89  // i.e no nested if condition below this node.
90  bool PopElseEntry(const IfNode& node);
91 
92  ValueValidityPairPtr result() { return std::move(result_); }
93 
94  const FunctionRegistry& registry_;
95  Annotator& annotator_;
96  std::stack<std::unique_ptr<IfStackEntry>> if_entries_stack_;
97  ValueValidityPairPtr result_;
98 };
99 
100 } // namespace gandiva
101 
102 #endif // GANDIVA_EXPR_DECOMPOSER_H
